/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in hues of white and blue, are adorned with numerous windows that reflect the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity with cars and buses moving along it, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the cityscape.
